text: We have created a blog theme, and above the fold we show banner and has a title and text on it, so LCP score is very poor, anyone can help me to get better LCP score in lighthouse and google page speed.

When you edit theme settings like colors and publish them where is that data saved? I noticed it is not rewriting the fields.json. I recently cloned a theme and a page and then pointed the cloned page to the newly cloned theme and it had the theme edited colors vs the default colors in fields.json. How would it know where to pickup those values? Just curious how all this works. Thank you.
